member.name: T:Flyher.Road.Net.HtmlPack
member.summary: 提取网页信息操作 Build 20130910 V1.00 Again 20130924 V1.00

member.name: M:Flyher.Road.Net.HtmlPack.GetHtml(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 获取网页源码节点信息
member.param: 获取的网页的文字编码(若此处传值为空字符串则为默认编码；Encoding.Unicode等等类似可查看编码;)

member.name: M:Flyher.Road.Net.HtmlPack.ConvertHtml(System.String)
member.summary: 将获取的网页源码转换成节点信息

member.name: M:Flyher.Road.Net.HtmlPack.GetAims(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,System.String)
member.returns: 返回匹配的数据;无匹配返回空;若出现错误返回-1

member.name: M:Flyher.Road.Net.HtmlPack.GetAimAttribute(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 返回匹配的标签属性(可能2)不分方法1不能处理的情况 如不分嵌套的a标签
member.returns: 返回匹配的数据;无匹配返回空;若出现错误返回-1

member.name: M:Flyher.Road.Net.HtmlPack.NodesCount(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,System.String)
member.summary: 获取节点兄弟(包括自己)的数目
member.param: 提取目标层次(例如:int count = rootNode.SelectNodes("//*[@id='xiang1']/tr").Count; 则表示id为xiang1的节点下tr的个数)
member.returns: 返回节点数目,无节点返回0,出现错误返回-1

member.name: M:Flyher.Road.Net.RegexMatch.GetHtml_UTF8(System.String)
